manufacturing.label: Used RV
manufacturing.description: A low cost RV, perfect for remote cooking.

manufacturing.label: Abandoned Trailer
manufacturing.description: An abandoned trailer in an area heavily neglected by the police.

manufacturing.label: Small House
manufacturing.description: A small house in a bad neighborhood.

manufacturing.label: Abandoned Warehouse
manufacturing.description: A large abandoned warehouse with vaulted ceilings.

manufacturing.label: Laboratory
manufacturing.description: An above ground laboratory outfitted for meth production.

manufacturing.label: Underground Laboratory
manufacturing.description: A massive hidden laboratory for your discreet cooking needs.

manufacturing.label: Meth-o-matic 9000
manufacturing.description: The latest and greatest in laboratory technology, converted for meth production.

manufacturing.label: Meth-o-matic 9000S
manufacturing.description: Just like Meth-o-matic, but features voice activated control.

manufacturing.label: Subterranean Complex
manufacturing.description: A sprawling underground complex the size of a small city.

manufacturing.label: Island State
manufacturing.description: Purchase a small island country, and turn it into a meth-based economic superpower.

manufacturing.label: Moonlab Alpha
manufacturing.description: A massive moon laboratory for cooking meth far away from the DEA''s clutches.

manufacturing.label: Meth Star
manufacturing.description: That''s no moon... it''s a man made super lab! With tractor beams.

manufacturing.label: Industrial Complex
manufacturing.description: A massive industrial complex with thousands of cooks. Cautious? Nope! Effective? You''re Goddamn right.

manufacturing.label: Heisenbelt
manufacturing.description: A series of labs on the outer edges of the solar system that convert asteroids into pure crystal.

manufacturing.label: Planetary Meth Replicator
manufacturing.description: Convert all of a planet''s matter into pure crystal.

manufacturing.label: Portal to The Crystalverse
manufacturing.description: Attempt to open a portal to another universe full of Cookies, err... Crystal Meth.

distribution.label: Dealer
distribution.description: A common street thug to sell your goods.

distribution.label: Drug Mule
distribution.description: Someone to stuff drugs in their rectum and distribute them.

distribution.label: Drug Van
distribution.description: A runned-down van that actively seeks out customers.

distribution.label: Sleazy Lawyer
distribution.description: Reduces your risk of getting charged by the DEA, also distributes some product on the side.

distribution.label: Night Club
distribution.description: Purchase a run down night club and sell your classy product to the patrons.

distribution.label: Drug Cartel
distribution.description: Drug cartels can move a lot of product, but their services are not free.

distribution.label: DEA Mole
distribution.description: Hire a DEA informant, which allows for increased and discreet distribution while reducing risk.

distribution.label: Foreign Diplomat
distribution.description: Hire a foreign diplomat to partner with the best drug pushers in their respective countries and reduce risk.

distribution.label: City Police Force
distribution.description: Pay off an entire city police force. All of them, even the by-the-book detectives, greatly reducing risk.

distribution.label: Crooked Senator
distribution.description: This crooked member of the senate will provide you with some of the best distribution channels as well as help keep the fed outta your biznaz.

distribution.label: Rival Cartel
distribution.description: Pay off a rival cartel, greatly increasing the demand for your product.

distribution.label: El Presidente
distribution.description: Partner with a dictator of an impoverished country for unchecked meth distribution.

distribution.label: Space Mules
distribution.description: Space mules ain''t your daddy''s drug mule. They supply extra terrestrial beings with a steady stream of your sweet sweet crystal.

distribution.label: Meth-Mart
distribution.description: The MM franchise is an easy way to distribute product to shoppers, but it''s very risky, as you would imagine.

distribution.label: Meth Horizon
distribution.description: According to commander Tony Drake, these high speed shuttles quickly transport product from the far edges of the solar system.

distribution.label: Intergalactic Meth Relay
distribution.description: Distribute meth to crank-lovin'' sentient life from the far reaches of the galaxy.

distribution.label: Church of the Crystal
distribution.description: Your meth is pure enough that there are some who believe Truth can be seen on the crystal''s surface.

laundering.label: Lemonade Stand
laundering.description: Launder minimal cash through a lemonade stand.

laundering.label: Nail Salon
laundering.description: Purchase a nail salon to launder a small amount of cash.

laundering.label: Banana Stand
laundering.description: Invest in a banana stand for your laundering pleasure.

laundering.label: Chicken Restaurant
laundering.description: Invest in a fried chicken restaurant to safely launder a fair amount of cash.

laundering.label: Car Wash
laundering.description: Launder cash through an overpriced car wash.

laundering.label: Online Donations
laundering.description: Launder cash through an online donation network.

laundering.label: Offshore Account
laundering.description: Launder cash using an offshore finance account.

laundering.label: NYME
laundering.description: Launder high volumes of cash through stocks and bonds on the New York Meth Exchange.

laundering.label: Food Franchise
laundering.description: Why launder through a restaurant, when you can launder through an entire franchise?

laundering.label: Space Cantina
laundering.description: Launder your cash on an intergalactic scale with the Space Cantina.

laundering.label: Space Resort
laundering.description: Launder your cash through a low gravity spa and resort.

laundering.label: Space Corp
laundering.description: Launder cash through a shady conglomerate that deals in planetary colonisation, asteroid mining, and other technology, with secret ties to the military.

laundering.label: The Crystal Methwork
laundering.description: Launder through a popular television network, included in every cable package in the galaxy.

upgrades.label: Air Fresheners
upgrades.description: With the sweet sent of pine in the air, you can cook an extra batch at a time.

upgrades.label: Exhaust Fan
upgrades.description: You can now cook 5 more batches at a time.

upgrades.label: Goatee
upgrades.description: Your mighty goatee intimidates buyers into buying more product; you can now sell an extra batch at a time.

upgrades.label: Industrial HVAC
upgrades.description: Keep the fumes out. You can now cook 100 more batches at a time.

upgrades.label: Prescription Glasses
upgrades.description: Your nerdy specs make your buyers feel they can trust you more; you can now sell 5 additional batches at a time.

upgrades.label: Porkpie Hat
upgrades.description: This early 20th century hat keeps the sun out of your eyes, allowing you to make an additional 50 batches at a time.

upgrades.label: Mariachi Band
upgrades.description: An authentic narcocorrido band to sing the tale of you and your meth. Allows you to charge an extra $5 per batch.

upgrades.label: Brewing Vats
upgrades.description: Cook your meth in massive vats like the pros. Allows you to cook an additional 500 batches at a time.

upgrades.label: Dealer Business Cards
upgrades.description: Improves sale rate of your dealers by .1/s.

upgrades.label: Spinnin'' Rims
upgrades.description: Roll with style! Improves the sale rate of your dealers by .2/s.

upgrades.label: Dealer Slacks
upgrades.description: Your dealers now wear nice slacks, reducing suspicion by 1%.

upgrades.label: Stuffed Mules
upgrades.description: Your Drug Mules can now sell an additional 3 batches at a time.

upgrades.label: Double Stuffed Mules
upgrades.description: Your Drug Mules can now sell an additional 16 batches at a time.

upgrades.label: Dealer Heat
upgrades.description: Now your dealers are packin'' heat, allowing them to safely sell another half-batch at a time.

upgrades.label: Van Jingle
upgrades.description: Your drug vans play a catchy jingle to attract more customers, selling 5 more batches at a time.

upgrades.label: Extra Sleaze
upgrades.description: Your lawyers are now extra sleazy, and can sell an additional 10 batches at a time.

upgrades.label: Better Lawyers
upgrades.description: Your sleazy lawyers now reduce risk by an additional 5%.

upgrades.label: Lawyers 2.0
upgrades.description: Your sleazy lawyers now use the Chewbacca Defense. They reduce risk by an additional 5%.

upgrades.label: Super Lawyers
upgrades.description: Your sleazy lawyers now wear a cape. They reduce risk by an additional 5%.

upgrades.label: Immortal Lawyers
upgrades.description: Your lawyers are now demigods. They reduce risk by an additional 10%.

upgrades.label: Diplomatic Immunity
upgrades.description: Your diplomats can now sell an extra 1K batches.

upgrades.label: Portable Power Generator
upgrades.description: Provides extra power to your RVs - adding 0.5 production per second.

upgrades.label: Shed Propane
upgrades.description: Outfit your Storage Sheds with propane and propane accessories. They cook another 0.8 batches at a time.

upgrades.label: RV Solar Panels
upgrades.description: Harness the power of the sun! Allows your RV cooks to make an additional 2.5 batches at a time.

upgrades.label: Mobile Lab
upgrades.description: Completely outfit your RVs for maximum meth production, netting you 16 extra batches at a time.

upgrades.label: Hazmat Suit
upgrades.description: Now you can cook without regard for personal safety! Make an additional 100 batches at a time.

upgrades.label: Personal Enforcer
upgrades.description: Hire a personal enforcer to prevent your shit from getting stolen, you can now sell an extra 100 batches at a time.

upgrades.label: Electric Hotplate
upgrades.description: Used for cooking.

upgrades.label: Gas Stove
upgrades.description: Improves meth purity by 0.5 IPU.

upgrades.label: Steel Burners
upgrades.description: Improves meth purity by another 0.5 IPU.

upgrades.label: Titanium Burners
upgrades.description: Spaceship-grade burners improve meth purity by 1 IPU.

upgrades.label: Platinum Burners
upgrades.description: Industrial grade platinum burners improve meth purity by 3 IPUs.

upgrades.label: Cheap Cookware
upgrades.description: Used to cook stuff.

upgrades.label: Stainless Steel Cookware
upgrades.description: Improves meth purity by 0.5 IPU.

upgrades.label: Glass Flasks
upgrades.description: Further improves meth purity by another 0.5 IPU.

upgrades.label: Hardened Glass Boilers
upgrades.description: Further improves meth purity by 1 IPU.

upgrades.label: Carbon Filtration
upgrades.description: Filters out the extra deadly components, adding 3 IPUs.

upgrades.label: Diamond Flasks
upgrades.description: Further improves purity by 5 IPUs.

upgrades.label: Platinum Boilers
upgrades.description: Improves purity by 10 IPUs!

upgrades.label: Space Hazmat Suit
upgrades.description: Now you can cook in space! Cook an additional 1000 batches at a time.

upgrades.label: SWAT Snipers
upgrades.description: Your team of highly trained snipers protects you during high-value transactions. Safely sell an additional 1000 batches at a time.

upgrades.label: Chemistry Doctorate
upgrades.description: By ordering this online degree, your increased confidence allows you to make another 50% of production batches at a time.

upgrades.label: Mech Suit
upgrades.description: Your mech suit keeps you safe while making deals. Sell an additional 50% of sales batches at a time.

upgrades.label: Slap Chop (TM)
upgrades.description: You''re gonna love my meth. With this precision cutting device, you can now make an additional 50% of production at a time.

upgrades.label: Fearless
upgrades.description: After facing death so many times, you no longer have a sense of self preservation. Sell another 50% of sales at a time.

upgrades.label: Pinky Genetics
upgrades.description: Hire every scientist on the planet to enhance your finger dexterity. Manually cook an additional 100% of production at a time.

upgrades.label: Methbie
upgrades.description: After being bitten by a radioactive crack head, you''ve gained super strength. Manually sell an additional 100% of sales at a time.

upgrades.label: Trick or Treat
upgrades.description: Hand out meth like it''s candy, and sell an additional 200% of sales at a time.

upgrades.label: Ancient Methology
upgrades.description: Send your best scientists to remote parts of the world looking for lost secrets of meth production, increase purity by 10 IPUs.

upgrades.label: Methylamine X
upgrades.description: By unlocking this experimental methylamine-based compound you increase purity by 10 IPUs.

upgrades.label: Meth of the Third Kind
upgrades.description: Extraterrestrial meth purification processes have been discovered on Mars. Increases purity by another 12 IPUs.

upgrades.label: Quantum Meth
upgrades.description: This meth is atomically perfect, alowing you to charge an additional $45 per batch.

upgrades.label: Holy Meth
upgrades.description: Your followers feel closer to the heavens when they gaze upon these holy crystals. Charge another $53 per batch.

upgrades.label: Angelic Meth
upgrades.description: It is said that the Arch Angels of Methen prefer the taste of your meth.

upgrades.label: Insider Trading
upgrades.description: Improves NYME laundering by $500m per second.

upgrades.label: Sleazy Brokers
upgrades.description: These sleazy stock brokers help your NYME launder an extra $1B per second.

upgrades.label: Fortune 500 Franchise
upgrades.description: Each franchise can now launder an extra $2B per second.

upgrades.label: Cantina Band
upgrades.description: Increase Cantina laundering speed by $5B with live flute music.

upgrades.label: Space Capitalism
upgrades.description: Increase Space Corps laundering rate by $0.2T.

upgrades.label: Thank You
upgrades.description: Thanks for donating, your meth is now worth $50 more per batch.
